ch.ffhs.inf09.pa.mashup_platform.common.db
Class DBLocal

java.lang.Object
  ch.ffhs.inf09.pa.mashup_platform.common.db.DBLocal
Direct Known Subclasses:
DBOrient
public abstract class DBLocal
extends java.lang.Object

The base class defines the interface of the local database that is used by the kernel and the web environment to exchange mashup data.

Author:
Alexander
